meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bill Lipscomb Laurie Chambliss Tim Buthod Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1894.

td.p: Bill Lipscomb, a Ph.D. candidate from Lynchburg, Virginia
Laurie Chambliss, a writer originally from Danville, Illinois
Tim Buthod, a credit union teller from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $21,900)

tr.td: BOATS & BOATING
PEOPLE & PLACES
FIRST LADIES
ALAN & MARILYN BERGMAN SONGS
EPONYMS
(Alex: Things that have taken the name of an individual, who may or may not have invented that particular item. Mae West is an example that comes to mind.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Punch printed a poem that said, "My opinion of" this Indian PM "is practically Zehru"')
